story.title: Inspired by Traditional Dravidian Temple Architecture
paragraphs: Bring divine elegance and spiritual calm into your space with this beautifully crafted south indian design table top temple inspired by traditional Dravidian temple architecture. Designed with intricate detailing and sacred proportions, this south indian design table top temple reflects timeless heritage blended with modern craftsmanship.

This south indian design table top temple features layered domes, ornamental carvings, and finely sculpted pillars that resemble classic South Indian mandirs. At the heart of the sanctum sits a serene Lord Ganesha idol, making this south indian design table top temple ideal for daily pooja, meditation, and spiritual rituals.

The soft LED illumination enhances the sacred aura of the south indian design table top temple, creating a warm and peaceful atmosphere. Perfect for modern homes and compact spaces, the south indian design table top temple fits beautifully on tables, shelves, office desks, and pooja corners.

quote.text: Where tradition meets modern living - bringing sacred geometry into your daily life.

items.question: Does this come with LED lights?
items.answer: Yes! This temple comes with integrated warm white LED lighting that creates a peaceful and spiritual atmosphere. The LED is battery operated for easy placement anywhere.

items.question: What is the size of this temple?
items.answer: The temple measures approximately 18cm in height, making it perfect for table tops, shelves, and pooja corners without taking up too much space.

items.question: Is the Ganesha idol included?
items.answer: Yes, the Lord Ganesha idol is permanently placed at the center of the temple as part of the complete design.
